hints.content:
We start at $4{:}06$ when Karim starts playing cards.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 4:00 to 5:00 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 4:00, 4:15, 4:30, 4:45, and 5:00 are labeled. A red circle appears on the unlabeled tick mark at 4:06. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Karim finished playing cards, we go **right** ${52}$ minutes from $4{:}06$.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{4{:}06} +{} &\goldE{4}\text{ minutes} = 4{:}10\\\\
{4{:}10} +{} &\purpleD{20}\text{ minutes} = 4{:}30\\\\
4{:}30 +{} & \greenD{20}\text{ minutes} = {4{:}50} \\\\
4{:}50 +{} &\redD{8}\text{ minutes} = \blueD{4{:}58}
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 4:00 to 5:00 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 4:00, 4:15, 4:30, 4:45, and 5:00 are labeled. A series of four arrows are shown moving left to right from the 4:06 tick mark to the 4:58 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 4:06 tick mark and ends at the 4:10 tick mark and is labeled plus 4. The second arrow starts at the 4:10 tick mark and ends at the 4:30 tick mark and is labeled plus 20. The third arrow starts at the 4:30 tick mark and ends at the 4:50 tick mark and is labeled plus 20. The fourth arrow starts at the 4:50 tick mark and ends at the 4:58 tick mark and is labeled plus 8. !

hints.content:
Karim finished playing cards at $\blueD{4{:}58} $.  

Which clock shows $\blueD{4{:}58}$?

When Karim finishes playing cards, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 5 and the long hand on the third tick mark after the 11. !

question.content:
Karim spends $52$ minutes playing cards with his grandfather.  Karim starts playing cards at $4{:}06 \text { p.m.}$

**What time does the clock show when Karim finishes playing cards?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 4 and 5 and the long hand on the first tick mark after the 9.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3535aaeed0017e9f0b7e39aae2e7e2387cddd5aa)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 5 and the long hand on the third tick mark after the 11.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fde5f380a58e6d00c8d74bc36513f2197c8983cb)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 6 and the long hand on the third tick mark after the 11.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/04aece11c3a3cafc361426eba916b8ae6f730782)
